title: The Apple Watch Is A Promising Venture In Healthcare Technology
text: The Apple Watch is redefining personal healthcare monitoring.

text: Apple (AAPL) is a stellar company that is a staple in most investors' portfolios. A mega-cap giant, the company is known for providing investors with serious gains with minimal drawdowns along the way.

title: US stocks plummet to worst monthly performance since 2020
text: The US indexes fell sharply after opening lower, with the S&P 500 plummeting 3.6%. The Dow Jones Industrial Average, which fell nearly 1000 points last Friday, shed another 966 points as it sank more than 2.8% to 32,977.21.

title: Plowing Through Earnings Season with a Bullish Outlook
text: It's been a momentous earnings season, and everything from big tech to the price of gold has been relevant. Learn what you need to know here.

title: Apple (AAPL) Q2 Earnings Top Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
text: Apple's (AAPL) second-quarter fiscal 2022 results reflect robust performance of Mac as well as Wearables, Home and Accessories sales and continued momentum in Services segments.

title: Apple Analysts See Production Issues As Transitory, Recommend Buying On Weakness Following Q2 Results
text: Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) reported better-than-expected second-quarter earnings and revenues. The sore spot was the warning regarding a $4 billion to $8 billion hit from supply disruptions in the third quarter.

title: Is AAPL Stock a Buy After Q1 Earnings? 3 Analysts Weigh In on Apple.
text: Three analysts believe that Apple is still benefiting from strong demand and continue to be bullish on the outlook of AAPL stock. The post Is AAPL Stock a Buy After Q1 Earnings?

title: Apple employees demand more flexibility from company as three-day office return looms
text: Some Apple employees are pushing back on the tech giant's return to office pilot program, which will soon require most of its corporate workers to be in the office at least three days per week.

title: The Ratings Game: Why Apple's supply crunch might not be that bad
text: Apple Inc. expects to face billions of dollars in supply-chain impacts during the current quarter, but analysts aren't sweating the smartphone giant's latest words of caution.

title: Apple's Numbers Complete Trifecta
text: You could almost hear the collective sigh of relief after Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) released their latest earnings report at the end of yesterday's session.

title: Why Apple Has It Tough in the Short Term
text: The tech giant's forecast for the June quarter, in which it expects supply constraints to crimp revenue, sends the stock lower.

title: Apple loses top spot in China as smartphone sales slump
text: Just three months ago, Apple became the top-selling smartphone brand in China for the first time in six years. Now it's fallen back behind its Chinese rivals after suffering more than others from a first quarter slump in sales.

title: Meta Soared on Earnings. Is It a Buy?
text: Even with mediocre numbers, the stock still popped. Is the worst over?

title: Futures fall as Amazon, Apple results disappoint
text: U.S. stock index futures fell on Friday as disappointing quarterly reports from Amazon and Apple pressured growth stocks, pushing the tech-heavy Nasdaq toward its worst month in two years.

title: Russian users sue Apple after payment service pulled -lawyers
text: A Russian law firm on Friday said it had filed a lawsuit against U.S. tech giant Apple seeking 90 million roubles ($1.28 million) in damages for consumers affected by Apple withdrawing its payment service from Russia.

title: Market Snapshot: Stock futures lower ahead of inflation data, with tech under pressure after Apple, Amazon disappointment
text: Stock futures were moving mostly lower on Friday, with tech stocks set to lead the way south after disappointing results from industry giants Amazon.com Inc. and Apple Inc.

title: Apple Has It Tough in the Short Term. Wall Street Sees the Headwinds as 'Transitory.
text: The tech giant's forecast for the June quarter, in which it expects supply constraints to crimp revenue, sends the stock lower.
